details:
Multiple vulnerabilities were discovered in FreeImage, a support library
for graphics image formats, which could result in the execution of
arbitrary code if malformed image files are processed.


For the oldstable distribution (bullseye), these problems have been fixed
in version 3.18.0+ds2-6+deb11u1.


For the stable distribution (bookworm), these problems have been fixed in
version 3.18.0+ds2-9+deb12u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your freeimage packages.


For the detailed security status of freeimage please refer to
its security tracker page at:
[\
https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/freeimage](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/freeimage)
